headline.print_headline: From a Tainted Christie, Republican Voters Demand Time and Attention
headline.main: From a Tainted Christie, Republican Voters Demand Time and Attention

lead_paragraph: Sipping his breakfast coffee in a cozy booth at Chez Vachon, a New Hampshire cafe favored by political junkies and a regular stop for aspirants on the campaign trail to the White House, Bill McEvoy debated the presidential future of Republican Chris Christie.
